Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires the metropolitan transportation authority install fire extinguishers in every subway station and each subway car and bus
Summary: Requires the metropolitan transportation authority install fire extinguishers in every subway station and each subway car and bus.
LawCode: Add ยง1270-k, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the metropolitan transportation authority provide fire extinguishers at each platform and on all subway cars
